name: Mystic - Spells list
content:
0-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.cmD9XPyg0Cud1xYO]{Daze} Humanoid creature of CR 3 or lower is dazed.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gEPdddzbgRAAa6j3]{Detect Affliction} Determine whether a creature or object has been poisoned, is diseased, is cursed, or is suffering a similar affliction.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kxx5x0JAgFuEQJAm]{Detect Magic} Detect spells and magic items within 60 feet.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.xCtwxPiV5ionTNal]{Fatigue} Touched creature is fatigued.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.J1k3B5PmIc4SUC9L]{Ghost Sound} Create minor illusory sounds.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.0v9JgXN6rI4sr975]{Grave Words} Force a corpse to babble.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.byAI5MUa3DgiiXc9]{Psychokinetic Hand} Telekinetically move an object of 1 bulk or less.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.v2zuuUuYEgBTMHWY]{Stabilize} Cause a dying creature to stabilize.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Ua6LvAS3vBdNk5EB]{Telekinetic Projectile} Telekinetically hurl an object, dealing 1d6 damage to the target and object.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.R6MvvYVPDf21fE8Y]{Telepathic Message} Send a short telepathic message and hear simple telepathic replies.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kNURbWD9d5768exU]{Token Spell} Perform simple magical effects.

 

1st-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.xQJexGLmCYF7VTdw]{Akashic Download} You do a cosmic search of the Akashic Record for information about a topic.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.6BH1w6ViKLDwYLV0]{Build Trust} You get a sense of the best way to interact with the target to encourage positive regard toward you.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zz8os3IJKswL8G8Z]{Carnivorous} Your mouth expands and your teeth grow sharp, granting you a bite attack.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3nFCrisRp2GIjbR3]{Charm Person} Make one humanoid creature believe that it is your ally.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.L3PFVkjem5W82scs]{Command} One creature obeys a select command for 1 round.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.64pkJDiNw8k5GF4d]{Comprehend Customs} Gain a +2 insight bonus to Culture checks about a specific culture made within the spell’s duration.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.infpQZm0h1FzN7YX]{Confusion, Lesser} One living creature is confused for 1 round.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.uiOCvZ7EuOVhAi0K]{Detect Augmentation} Detect the presence of augmentations in the area.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.uk49OnFMhCg9CSv1]{Detect Radiation} Detect radiation within 120 feet.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.moyeAHT4yzZVWmmg]{Detect Thoughts} “Listen” to surface thoughts.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.HGg3fIQGDzUwueVa]{Disguise Self} Change your appearance.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3I4iNxI1qfObcKPF]{Ectoplasmic Barrage} You fling psychic material, called ectoplasm, at the target, making a ranged attack against its KAC and dealing bludgeoning damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zZGvuXQErBrHqyS6]{Fear} Frighten a single living creature that's of CR 4 or lower for 1d4 rounds.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.AInneaaTOM6vd3a7]{Gloom Mote} Create a mote of light from the Shadow Plane, which draws other nearby lights down into shadow.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.PlIKBubNljqxVPsz]{Identify} Gain a +10 bonus to identify items of a magic or technological nature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.33ppc6IfWm5ZwX9o]{Illusory Star Field} Use illusory stars to grant a +3 bonus to Bluff checks made to convince creatures of their location.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.WVlj6EuKGCrjozBH]{Keen Senses} Target gains low-light vision and a +2 bonus to Perception checks.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.RtAXTXOSfg8YXiVA]{Know Coordinates} Briefly conjure a cybernetic augmentation.Learn the exact location of one creature on the same world as you.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.2l5Xk1YMzp0hlUok]{Life Bubble} Encase targeted creatures with a shell of tolerable atmosphere.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.hagfk2IjH0AaSTnO]{Megavitamin} Create a small number of nutritional supplements.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.1Bp9w3mHIGlo5s7e]{Memory Lapse} You inspire a moment of confusion that causes a creature to forget what occurred over the last round if it fails its saving throw.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.bbZ9UHCsfzRPxiuC]{Might of the Ellicoth} Increase the amount of bulk a creature can carry.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.c8FSuYsLfYviJYYF]{Mind Link} Instantly and telepathically communicate information to a creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.7XJ6x5BZv1k1eBBz]{Mind Thrust} Mentally deal 2d10 damage to one target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nffP8Mq7rJ8Rskb9]{Mystic Cure} Restore 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier Hit Points to a living creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.mNHdfIKpF11fhEjo]{Necromantic Revitalization} Restore hit points to an undead creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gZmdBEZsxOJgGYIA]{Pyre Wreath} Creates 3 orbs that can absorb fire damage for the user.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.yBQ7jy3qf2Q9wkRc]{Quick Change} Adjacent creatures who are unaware of your true form are flat-footed until the beginning of their next turn.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.MTHL2TQjb7tWuZVS]{Reflecting Armor} Sheath of mystical force can reflect damage back on foe.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.tzBzAK2mkdtaTRXw]{Remove Condition, Lesser} Remove one minor harmful condition affecting a creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.AZBzNyXpBU1yaE5r]{Scan Environment} You analyze the naturally occurring environment in the area, learning the state of the atmosphere, biomes, and gravity.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.7OjQ2uotsMm8NYSU]{Seeking Shot} Cause a single attack to ignore cover and concealment.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Q9W1JWVHI9iq2R6y]{Share Language} Target understands chosen languages.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.2vjeLKWVi35DyjNn]{Share Memory} Target shares memory with you and five others.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.bqyeQ1GOKReVimwe]{Slithering Chain} Summon a chain from the Shadow Plane to trip your enemy.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.AmVCSTcRS3bainbG]{Spirit-bound Armor} A benevolent spirit steadies a creature wearing armor, offsetting flat-footed and off-kilter penalties.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.y8gV7OICXyfxlSlO]{Spirit-bound Computer} A benevolent spirit inhabits a computer and can make Computers checks you request.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.dIlKtUGGKcur6OaK]{Wisp Ally} Create wisp of energy that shines light and distracts an enemy.

 

2nd-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.4MJMFISvSHl8p82D]{Alter Corpse} You cause a corpse to change to suit a narrative you choose.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.uH3JWy7ICH8DNS8m]{Augury} Learn whether an action will be good or bad.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.cRnYtsbLQzNnIs1n]{Command Undead} Undead creature obeys your commands.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.muDgBqHYvCkPUEoZ]{Daegoxian Spore Cloud} 

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.XZ1X1IzN0tckzOPn]{Darkvision} Grant ability to see 60 feet in total darkness.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.l0jjaYzYskb9omJb]{Daze Monster} Target living creature of CR 5 or lower is dazed.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.9fN20FGd94L3DXOr]{Ego Whip} You overwhelm your opponent’s ego, diminishing its sense of self, hope, and confidence.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.7CuJLZTI7urZTQjE]{Emberstep} Leaves a trail of fire behind you.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zZGvuXQErBrHqyS6]{Fear} Frighten multiple creatures of CR 4 or lower for 1 minute.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.UVzRPQeiV2yl6QAn]{Fog Cloud} Create a fog that obscures vision.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wYkD8HZaenhB8xts]{Force Blast} Cone deals 2d6 force damage and bull rushes creatures.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.VdlnH13oPGQN9wij]{Haunted Armor} Armor interferes with the wearer’s movement.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.9BxigRaK0y4IpHph]{Haunted Combatant} Haunt an enemy’s weapons, interfering with attacks made with those weapons.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.W0oa8tqHXAcWNaGT]{Hold Person} Paralyze one humanoid.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.LS1E6dMx3k298dqb]{Hurl Forcedisk} Disc deals 3d6 force damage to one target then ricochets to other targets, dealing 2d6 force damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.2AYPwSy7I0Ar8yAH]{Inflict Pain} Wracking pain imposes -2 penalty to ability checks, attack rolls, and skill checks on one target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.7XJ6x5BZv1k1eBBz]{Mind Thrust} Mentally deal 4d10 damage to one target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nffP8Mq7rJ8Rskb9]{Mystic Cure} Restore 3d8 + your Wisdom modifier Hit Points to a living creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.mNHdfIKpF11fhEjo]{Necromantic Revitalization} Restore hit points to an undead creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.P9aD4oydmGXNXe43]{Paranoia} Force a creature to lash out at everyone, even their friends.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zsO3bIaSz0WDlUuk]{Perfect Recall} Recall one memory unaltered by magic perfectly.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.DEeTPGEcAUU29gXe]{Predict Foe} As a reaction, shout a warning to an ally and grant that ally concealment against an attack.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.P914huUKtKXr2zDB]{Reject Augmentation} Targeted creature is sickened and can't use any augmentations for the duration.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wMBxnYkNbzWJklIB]{Remove Condition} Remove one moderate harmful condition affecting a creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.svfCmxHfEGE6wAMc]{Resist Radiation} Automatically succeed at saving throws against weak radiation and suppress radiation sickness.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.yd5mQwImyuqd8wUs]{Restoration, Lesser} Dispel magical ability penalty or cure 1d4 ability damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.5aW793TGgd3Kd4Fe]{See Invisibility} See invisible creatures or objects.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.qbeQtgCtP8avY2ny]{Shield Other} You take half of the target's Hit Point damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.ZsRv2Vcl2iamrcCt]{Song Of The Cosmos} Creatures near you must succeed at a Will saving throw or be fascinated for 1 round.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.jA6eTWFaULIpjXAx]{Spider Climb} Grant ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Mn5F4th3ctW5oKJ4]{Status} Monitor condition and position of allies.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.GQeKJki7ErOP4qUi]{Venomous Weapon} You touch a weapon that deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage and imbue it with poison.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.V3mnCtb962WQlICq]{Zone of Truth} Creatures within range can't lie.

 

3rd-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Jrx0dGgxtVkLcZd1]{Bestow Curse} Target takes -4 penalty to attack rolls, saves, and checks or 50% chance of not acting on each of its turns.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.736kBaSS8R3XED1M]{Burning Ash Cloud} Creates a cloud that blocks vision and causes fire damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.SysRFlYml1f1Eofd]{Charm Monster} Make one creature believe it is your ally or one day per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.4Z6WeMM9uJ1U0wG6]{Clairaudience/Clairvoyance} Hear or see at a distance for 1 minute per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Q6ca5NajAWAgZp5S]{Deep Slumber} Put a number of creatures whose CRs total 8 or less to sleep.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.KQ4vSfG9tq8EJxir]{Dispel Magic} Cancel one magical spell or effect.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kh8VqsqbxngDA1c2]{Divine Aspect} You adopt the intimidating aura of a god.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.S8cNpjd2gMJ6lffz]{Etheric Shards} You harden ethereal matter into interplanar blades that are invisible to those who cannot see into the Ethereal Plane.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zZGvuXQErBrHqyS6]{Fear} Targets of CR 8 or lower within a cone are panicked for 1 minute.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.y9YQXmyA82gXnRGN]{Glimpse Of Truth} This spell functions as true seeing, except as noted.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.PecEOjojT15BJKi9]{Haste} One creature per level moves and acts faster.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.R83oLIyzHG3EaLoh]{Hologram Memory} Extract a creature's memory and replay it as a hologram.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.8FNA793CY1hNWUEP]{Id Insinuation} By invading targets with your psychic presence, you isolate parts of their minds, preventing them from functioning in a coherent manner.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3unsFniXAJCoerPr]{Intellect Fortress} When you or a creature within range is subjected to a mind‑affecting effect while this spell is active, you disrupt it with the power of pure logic.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.vOQ1NkfDHafdqTfE]{Irradiate} Flood area with dangerous radiation.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.dNNUCRXmCtrucIKf]{Mental Block} Cause creatures to forget how to use their feats and abilities

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.qZwiwVn1VdlTX71E]{Meticulous Match} You compare two similar items and know if they are identical to one another or not.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.XGi2g9pQwzebQtHR]{Mind of Three} You split your mind, retaining your normal consciousness but gaining two other personas.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.7XJ6x5BZv1k1eBBz]{Mind Thrust} Mentally deal 7d10 damage to one target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nffP8Mq7rJ8Rskb9]{Mystic Cure} Restore 5d8 + your Wisdom modifier Hit Points to a living creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.mNHdfIKpF11fhEjo]{Necromantic Revitalization} Restore hit points to an undead creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.BadW8vaiF813YRw1]{Nightmare} Send a terrible nightmare to a distant target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.e6iK8NCKZTNkDffh]{Pinpoint Navigation} Gain +10 to Piloting checks for navigation.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wB957SDHp5jkTR4F]{Polar Vortex} You generate an arctic storm of harsh winds and battering hail and snow.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.OHGWvzUb9MJCNB8u]{Psychokinetic Strangulation} Concentrate to immobilize target and deal 3d8 damage per round.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.oCZRtcoaUZKR1eSo]{Ray of Exhaustion} Ray makes target exhausted.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.YGkyMwEE6SLfZc4r]{Remove Affliction} Neutralize curses, diseases, infestations, poisons, and other harmful conditions affecting a creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nsrp5apjB7X8aOgV]{Resistant Armor, Lesser} Grant DR 5/— or energy resistance 5 against two energy types.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.4prroV3z26u1cy5y]{Slow} One creature per level moves and acts slower.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.SLwl3LWEm2DyzNc4]{Speak with Dead} Corpse answers up to six questions.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nmBeoZQUNcZw7nmy]{Suggestion} Compel a target to follow stated course of action.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rHscFpMmXkZOOkgV]{Synaptic Pulse} Stun all creatures within 20 feet for 1 round.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.uWKhr01bnKxuNRkL]{Tongues} Target can speak and understand any language.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.G5BCE1kbpOj1mwiq]{Umbral Tendrils} Assault a group of creatures with shadowy tentacles.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.XBuEMnUgarrcM5qk]{Viral Destruction} Create a virus in a recently dead body, allowing it to strike again and potentially spread the virus further.

 

4th-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.tDS3tcN5yD0Y9D52]{Animate Dead} Create controlled undead creatures out of target corpses.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.11X6d8ptU5SKMUQ0]{Baleful Polymorph, Mass} Change multiple targets' shapes to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.BQHFi2CRH4LnowYb]{Borrow Corruption} Gain the benefits of a corruption from someone else.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wSeE9HyAmM7lTdpo]{Confusion} Targets behave randomly for 1 round per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.FTBjUT3rg3Rosn8l]{Control Atmosphere} Alter the corrosiveness, density, or toxicity of the surrounding atmosphere

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.yqMZTZSiV3hPIRr6]{Cosmic Eddy} Whirlwind deals 4d6 damage and knocks creatures prone.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.QtZHSuJf0hcryYtR]{Death Ward} Target gains +4 bonus to saves against death spells, and is immune to negative energy and gaining negative levels.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3us1YJn4pQg6QEc1]{Dimensional Anchor} Prevent a target from leaving the plane.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.7HZVlS48z55YO78b]{Discern Lies} Reveal deliberate falsehoods.

Dismissal: Force a creature to return to its native plane.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.JDB8BExJpNT04wUz]{Displace Memory} You deposit a memory into a small object.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.APgLb0BS0VgtE06l]{Divination} Gain useful advice for specific proposed actions.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.CO9wzmYbZjeijJUc]{Ectoplasmic Eruption} Swirling psychic matter, known as ectoplasm, erupts from a point you choose.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wQBbe1s9VYVm5vGG]{Enervation} Ray imposes 2 negative levels.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zZGvuXQErBrHqyS6]{Fear} All targets within a cone are panicked for 1 minute.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.y07M0jd1sVw4uRPh]{Gravity Well} Create a point of high gravity that knocks creatures in the area prone and pulls them closer to the center.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.sI0dGecvFmVOPPhn]{Hold Monster} Paralyze one creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.UQYaZbfgch9AGnJJ]{Miasma} Create air that sickens those who breathe it.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Yw8a8A1rjbLXkcpr]{Mind Probe} Potentially access a target creature's memories and its knowledge.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.7XJ6x5BZv1k1eBBz]{Mind Thrust} Mentally deal 10d10 damage to and fatigue a single target.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nffP8Mq7rJ8Rskb9]{Mystic Cure} Restore 12d8 + your Wisdom modifier Hit Points to a living creature or restore life to a recently slain creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.mNHdfIKpF11fhEjo]{Necromantic Revitalization} Restore hit points to an undead creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zNSqMd0Tq5JY8hwQ]{Planar Binding} Trap an extraplanar creature of CR 4 or lower until it performs a task.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} Change the target's shape into that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.w3vQYdl7EZGecOHT]{Polymorph, Mass} Change multiple target's shapes to that of another creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.Na8z3VijtClCGiZ4]{Read the Flames} Gives you a single use bonus in the near future.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.HzDlGGxns8iEBHIr]{Reanimate Construct} This spell turns a destroyed construct into a creature that obeys your spoken commands.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.AHfzMTHx9PI4Z4zn]{Reincarnate} Bring a target dead creature back to life in a random body.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.ANDdDHLnY7Dfnhtq]{Remove Radioactivity} Remove ongoing radiation effects from a creature or object.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.XaWgkqcJcCeQVbnD]{Resistant Armor} Grant DR 10/— or energy resistance 10 to three energy types.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.usqy3VusjjgEnM9N]{Restoration} Restores ability score drain and negative levels.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.bqYL9jEBAU7eqBjf]{Shadow Jump} Travel through the Shadow Plane to move to a distant shadow.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.NoIRRaiWVr8xxcJX]{Song Of The Cosmos, Greater} Creatures near you are fascinated or dazzled for 1d4 rounds.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.OM40z8TakmsrvDQU]{Telepathic Bond} Link allows allies to communicate.

 

5th-Level

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} Change the target's shape to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.11X6d8ptU5SKMUQ0]{Baleful Polymorph, Mass} Change multiple targets' shapes to that of a smaller, weaker creature.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.JJYqJxRIOm9EiGtR]{Battlemind Link} Creates a psychic link that gives a bonus to initiative and other benefits.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.ECQacpm9nCOg31Hy]{Break Enchantment} Free creatures from curses, enchantments, and transmutations.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.CL7z3gbZwpJtAt0p]{Call Cosmos} Rain cosmic particles on targets, dealing 4d6 fire damage and 3d6 cold damage.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.fGQnZEijK2SYGnN1]{Command, Greater} One creature per level obeys select command for 1 round per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.4Th6qVd020dWsRPc]{Commune With Planet} Learn information about the planet you occupy, or about a planet in whose orbit you’re within.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.nbpKo7JBQLEfjGCL]{Commune with Nature} Learn about terrain for 1 mile per level.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.0c25gVm7RKKg1nIy]{Contact Other Plane} Ask questions of extraplanar entity.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.MZlIC1Y3pWl690LT]{Crush Skull} Deal 18d8 damage to living creature's head.

Dismissal: Force extraplanar creatures whose total CR is no greater than your level + 2 to return to their native planes.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.1FfFraWlxCu1L4rL]{Dispel Magic, Greater} Cancel multiple spells or effects.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.J14mFZezYHIGHVhO]{Dominate Person} Control humanoid telepathically.

@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.wKYmjm8OFwa5L0vX]{Feeblemind} Target's Intelligence and Charisma scores drop to 1.
